model Person {
    fields {
        name Text
    }
}

model Thing {
    fields {
        description Text
    }
}

===

model Person {
    fields {
        name Text
        favouriteThing Thing
    }
}

model Thing {
    fields {
        description Text
    }
}

===

ALTER TABLE "person" ADD COLUMN "favourite_thing_id" TEXT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "person" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("favourite_thing_id") REFERENCES "thing"("id");

=== 

[
  { "Model": "Person", "Field": "favouriteThing", "Type": "ADDED" },
  { "Model": "Person", "Field": "favouriteThing", "Type": "FK_CONSTRAINED" }
]
